name: Trash Cat (Nebulosa)
description:
Trail behind your friend Dog's garbage truck, tossing any garbage you find into the back. Be careful to not get hit by cars, fall too far behind, or run out of time! Though the odds may seem against you, fight back with the power of upgrades gained by throwing varying amounts of trash into the truck! Try to see how much trash you can collect before you eventually lose, and have fun!

All art by @Texilated on twitter or Texilated#4347 on discord
